report.title: Map of regional coordinator insect species data for SPRING
report.description: Map of regional coordinator insect species data for SPRING.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_occurrences_nonfunctional conf on conf.id = o.id JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id = o.taxa_taxon_list_id and cttl.taxon_list_id in (#taxon_list_ids#) JOIN cache_samples_functional csf on csf.id = o.sample_id JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional snf ON snf.id=csf.id JOIN locations square on square.id = csf.location_id AND square.location_type_id = #1km_square_location_type_id# AND square.deleted = false JOIN location_attribute_values country_code_attr_val on country_code_attr_val.location_id = square.id AND country_code_attr_val.location_attribute_id = #country_code_loc_attr_id# AND country_code_attr_val.deleted = false JOIN locations country on country.code = country_code_attr_val.text_value AND country.location_type_id = #country_location_type_id# AND country.deleted = false #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND ((trim('#year_sort_order#') = '0' OR '#year_sort_order#'='<please select>' OR csf.date_end >= CAST((0-(#year_sort_order#)::int)::text || '-01-01' as date)) AND (trim('#year_sort_order#') = '0' OR '#year_sort_order#'='<please select>' OR csf.date_start <= CAST((0-(#year_sort_order#)::int)::text || '-12-31' as date))) AND ('#specimen_code_param#' = '' OR conf.attrs_json->>('#specimen_code_occ_attr_id#') like '%' || '#specimen_code_param#' || '%') AND o.created_by_id=#current_user_id# #idlist#

param.name: current_user_id
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating that the user owns the record.

param.name: specimen_code_occ_attr_id
param.description: ID of the occurrence attribute that holds the specimen code.

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: default_input_form
param.description: Input form path to use when no other available

param.name: year_sort_order
param.description: Select a year, or leave blank for all years

param.name: specimen_code_param
param.description: Specimen code to search for. Leave blank for all.

param.name: taxon_list_ids
param.description: Only include occurrences in these taxon_list_ids.

param.name: input_form_to_ignore
param.description: Input form to ignore data from.

param.name: country_code_loc_attr_id
param.description: ID of the location attribute that holds the country code for an 1km location.

param.name: 1km_square_location_type_id
param.description: ID of the location type for 1km Squares.

param.name: country_location_type_id
param.description: ID of the location type for countries.

column.name: source
column.sql: snf.website_title || ' | ' || case when substring(snf.survey_title from 1 for length(snf.website_title)) = snf.website_title then trim(substring(snf.survey_title from length(snf.website_title)+1)) else snf.survey_title end

column.name: input_form
column.sql: case when csf.input_form is null then '#default_input_form#' else csf.input_form end
